1370: Reinardus moved to Muurhuysen2.C.0 after marriage.
Got married to Aleydis at age 19 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Emgelberna, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Siwa, at age 24.
1377: Had a son with Aleydis, Gherung, at age 26.
1378: Had a son with Aleydis, Menaures, at age 27.
1380: Lost son Menaures when Menaures was 3 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Salome, at age 30.
1383: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Itsburgis, at age 32.
Became caretaker of Emgelberna, Siwa, Gherung, Salome, Itsburgis at age 33.
1384: Lost daughter Itsburgis when Itsburgis was 2 years old.
